Message:
At my question, the girl stopped,
turning back to flash me
a soft smile.

She’s a kind and caring girl
with a brilliant smile.

A girl like that is heading for
the battlefield, blade in hand.

Only for her beloved blade
alone to return...

Why does it always
turn out like this...?
All I want...is for everyone
to come back alive...!

I don’t have the ability to
see the power others hold.
Even if I teach them
how to survive in combat,
only a few ever make it back...

That may very well be the path
my pupils have chosen,
but I can’t stand to
watch their fates play out!

I want to save them,
even if it means interfering
with the destiny they’ve
decided to march towards.

If I could have
the power to do that,
I would make any sacrifice...

Please...give me the power
to change everyone’s fates...!
